askForPostsFavorites: Ride created succesfully.You can save it in your favorites so to avoid filling again information.
changePassDescription: Give us the email you used for registration and a new password will be sent to you, which you can change.
passLength: Password consists of at least 5 characters.
checkEmail: Didn't you receive an email? Check your spam folder âœ‰
passwordDifferent: Password with confirmed password are different.
datesTooltipFilters: You can search depending on both date range of departing and returning. If you choose only initial date you will see the rides since then.
datesTooltip: You can choose one initial departing date or a range of dates you might depart. Same applies to the returning dates.
phoneIncorrect: number does not match a phone number
contactInputPLaceholder: Any question, query, problem or suggestion you have, you can contact us ..
tooltipPhoneText: Your phone number will be visible to other users only if you receive/give an aprroval.
forbidCreatePost: You can not create a ride because you do not have a vehicle. You can update your profile to unlock the ride creation
receiveNotification: Do you want to receive notificatoin when a similar ride is posted?
closeAppAsk: Are you sure you want to close app?
noMore3Stops: You cannot add more than three middle stops!
alreadyAddedAsInitial: You have already added this stop as initial destination!
alreadyAddedAsFinal: You have already added this stop as final destination!
destAlreadyAddedAsInitial: You have already added this location as initial destination!
destAlreadyAddedAsFinal: You have already added this location as final destination!
alreadyAdded: this stop has already been added!
selectInitialReturningDate: You must select initial returning date
selectDestinations: You must select initial && final destination!
alreadyAddedAsMiddle: You have added this location as middle stop!
seeFavPosts: Here you can see your favorite posts.
tooltipFavorites: When you press 'Re-Post' the information of the ride will fill the fields in the create ride screen so as not to be filled by you.
notVisibleTillGetApproval: Not visible until you receive/give approval.
mustChooseInitialDepartDate: You must select initial departure date!
noCarLabel: If you don't own a car you can proceed
choosePhotoRegister: You can choose from your mobile, or take one with the camera
datePassed: The date you chose has passed
selectDateUpTo30: You can select date up to 30 days starting from today!
initialFirstThanFinal: Initial department date must come first from final!
initialFirstThanInitialReturn: Initial date must come first from initial returning date!
finalFirstThanInitialReturn: Final department date must come first from the initial returning date!
initialFirstThanFinalReturn: The initial returning date must come first from the returning final date!
initialDepartFirstThanFinalReturn: Final returning date must not come first from initial department date!
ratingNote: *It is important to make the review as much objective as possible. Thank you!
initialReturnFirstThanFinalDepart: Initial returning date must come after final department date and initial department date
departFinalFirstReturnFinal: Final department date must come first from final returning date
stopReceivingNotifications: Are you sure you want to stop receiving notifications for this ride?
deleteDescription: Are you sure you want delete your account? This action cannot be reversed.
